channel.title: IFAL News-English
channel.description: כל שבוע אסקור לכם כתבות מעניינות ואלמד אתכם אנגלית בצורה קלילה וכיפית.
channel.itunes:author: יוני כהן

item.title: Closed Skies and Hidden Flights
item.description: In this episode, we explore how some Israelis are flying home from Cyprus. While most wait for open skies, a few use private helicopters. Discover why these flights are special and what it tells us about travel today.
item.itunes:author: יוני כהן

item.title: Dramatic Rescues and Unexpected Challenges
item.description: In this episode, we talk about a dramatic rescue of people from Cyprus. We also discuss a young woman who faced unexpected challenges after offering shelter. Join us to hear these engaging stories today!
item.itunes:author: יוני כהן

item.title: Court Orders and Peaceful Shelters
item.description: In this episode, we talk about a big court decision that helped a family stay together. We also discuss a fight in a shelter during a time of danger, showing how important it is to stay calm and help each other. Listen in for stories about finding peace and unity.
item.itunes:author: יוני כהן

item.title: A Pause for Peace מתקדמים
item.description: Join us as we explore a fragile ceasefire bringing relief to many. Discover stories of hope amidst past conflicts. Learn how communities rebuild and hope for lasting peace.
item.itunes:author: יוני כהן

item.title: Peace and New Beginnings בינוני
item.description: Join us as we explore recent peaceful developments. Discover how people felt relief after a ceasefire. Learn about rebuilding efforts and hopes for the future. It's a time for healing and moving forward together.
item.itunes:author: יוני כהן

item.title: Peace and Challenges מתחילים
item.description: In this episode, we talk about a new peace agreement and how it affects people. We also discuss a soldier's story and plans for rebuilding schools. Join us to learn more about these important events!
item.itunes:author: יוני כהן

item.title: A New Face in Campus Rules בינוני
item.description: In this episode, we talk about a university that doesn't allow a student to wear a niqab on campus. Discover the reasons behind this decision and how it affects the student's life. We will explore the balance between rules and personal freedom.
item.itunes:author: יוני כהן

item.title: Cultural Choices and Challenges מתקדמים
item.description: In this episode, we explore cultural conflicts and safety concerns. From university dress codes to military incidents, learn how different communities navigate rules and expectations. Let's dive into these real-world stories together!
item.itunes:author: יוני כהן

item.title: Stories Behind the News מתחילים
item.description: Join us as we explore interesting news stories. Discover the exciting world of bunker bombs and military life. Understand the challenges of aid delivery and personal choices. Learn English while learning about the world!
item.itunes:author: יוני כהן

item.title: Inspiration and Connection מתקדמים
item.description: Discover how running can lead to love, and listen to stories of strength and spirit. From touching music to lasting friendships, we explore how people connect through challenges and creativity.
item.itunes:author: יוני כהן

item.title: Inspiring Love Stories and Uniting Talents מתחילים
item.description: In this episode, discover movies where running leads to love stories. Hear how Israel's President supports a famous singer's health fight. Meet a strong woman fighting misinformation, and listen to a soldier's touching song. Lastly, enjoy the reunion of two beloved comedians.
item.itunes:author: יוני כהן

item.title: Entertainment Buzz: Music and Screen מתקדמים
item.description: Join us to hear about star-studded music events and exciting new TV shows. Discover Ayel Golan's big concert plans and Hagi Levine's new mini-series. We also look at a surprise hospital concert and a new telenovela. Tune in for all things fun and entertaining!
item.itunes:author: יוני כהן
